argument.description: An expression that returns a value of one of the following built-in data types: DATE, TIMESTAMP, timestamp duration, or a valid character string representation of a date or timestamp that is not a CLOB.

description: The MICROSECOND function returns the microsecond part of a value.
sample:
SELECT * FROM TABLEA
     WHERE MICROSECOND(TS1) <> 0
       AND
     SECOND(TS1) = SECOND(TS2)
